comments:
Hi,
    Im getting the error following error when i try to access a static 
HashTable using in Webspshere Application Server version 5.1. The same piece 
of code falls through fine in WAS 4.0.  Is there a compatibility issue with 
the JAR files  Please let me know.

Thanks a ton!

Regards
Arul

*******************************************************************************

SRVE0026E: [Servlet Error]-[receiver is incompatible with declaring class 
(class: com/orionauto/autolink/crbridge/helperobjects/CRPolicyBuilder 
method: 
buildCRPolicy(Ljava/lang/String;)Lcom/orionauto/autolink/businessob
jects/Policy;) at pc: 18]: java.lang.VerifyError: receiver is 
incompatible with declaring class (class: 
com/orionauto/autolink/crbridge/helperobjects/CRPolicyBuilder method: 
buildCRPolicy(Ljava/lang/String;)
Lcom/orionauto/autolink/businessobjects/Policy;) at pc: 18
	at java.lang.Throwable.<init>(Throwable.java)

*******************************************************************************

Sounds like a bug in our compiler. The generated file for CRPolicyBuilder 
seems incorrect, and rejected by the VM. 

Please provide steps to reproduce and reopen. Without steps, we cannot do 
anything. Note that we addressed numerous compiler issues since this version.
Closing as never got requested information

traces.message: receiver is  incompatible with declaring class (class:  com/orionauto/autolink/crbridge/helperobjects/CRPolicyBuilder method:  buildCRPolicy(Ljava/lang/String;) Lcom/orionauto/autolink/businessobjects/Policy;) at pc: 18
